admin.siteName-help: If your object is part of a larger web site, the name which should be displayed for the overall site. e.g., "IMDb".
admin.ogimage-help: An image URL which should represent your object within the graph.
admin.ogdesc-help: A one to two sentence description of your website.
admin.ogtitle-help: The title of your object as it should appear within the graph, e.g., "The Rock".
admin.ogurl-help: The canonical URL of your object that will be used as its permanent ID in the graph, e.g., "https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0117500/".
